page.title: 04The Parish Council
page.content: Our survey area includes three{parish {councils}Highwood,Fryerning and Blackmore .{Blackmore Parish Council was started in December 1894. The Council now consists of{thirteen {members}who are split into four sub-committees{,Planning,Environmental {,Recreation and Policy,}and{Rescources {.The job of the Parish Council}is to deal with local problems.{Elections {are held once}every four years. All adults over the age of{eighteen}who are{resident}in the{Parish}are eligible to vote.The Council meets on the third Thursday in the month and the four{sub_committees meet}at other times. A clerk is employed as secretary. The{Parish Council}has now got a{community bus}, have started a youth club,{landscaped open spaces}and provided{sports facilities}and a Village Hall.
